short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go favorite anything and everything on the web for you to check back on later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With FaveIt you can add all your favorite items in your favelist across ALL websites.

Make comparing items across many websites easy by adding them to your favelist and do a side by side comparison.

Go FaveIt now! ⭐

--------------------
April Update:

Filter items favorited ages ago by name.
Jobs 💼 You can now favorite jobs on Indeed, LinkedIn and others! 💼
Fashion 👗 You can now favorite fashion items on Asos, Zara and others! 👚
eBay has now been integrated!
Amazon has now been integrated!
